mapper.select: select cart_id, member_id, product_id, quantity, created_date from cart order by cart_id desc
select cart_id, member_id, product_id, quantity, created_date from cart where cart_id=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into product(member_id, product_id, quantity, created_date) values(#{memberNo},#{productNo},#{quantity},#{createdDate})
mapper.update: update cart set cart_id=#{cartNo}, member_id=#{memberNo}, product_id=#{productNo}, quantity=#{quantity}, created_date=#{createdDate} where cart_id=#{cartNo}
